title: My time again - Richard Burton
brief_description: Richard Burton talks about how he became an actor, and discusses the art of acting for stage and screen with Michael Elwyn who is, like Burton, a Welsh actor who moved towards professional acting while a member of the Oxford University Dramatic Society.
